abstract: After resisting calls for more information, the bank says it will make a public disclosure any time it claws back money from any member of the company’s operating committee.
snippet: After resisting calls for more information, the bank says it will make a public disclosure any time it claws back money from any member of the company’s operating committee.
lead_paragraph: After first resisting, JPMorgan Chase is bowing to shareholders on a request to disclose more information when it claws back money from top executives.

headline.main: JPMorgan Says It Will Publicly Disclose Pay Clawbacks
headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; JPMorgan Agrees to Disclose Information on ‘Clawbacks’
